description: A heavy coil of tarred hemp rope for dredger rigging work

core:description.text: A working coil of hemp rope, thick as a man's thumb and stiff with tar that keeps the rot at bay. It smells of pitch and old water, the kind of smell that never fully leaves a dredger's gear. The coil is wound tight and bound with a simple hitch, ready to unroll without tangling when the work demands it. Years of use have made the fibers soft where hands grip most often, but the core holds strongâ€”this is rope for hauling, lashing, and lowering loads down into places where the light doesn't reach.
